title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1627-4.10 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1627-4.10 - General

State Regulations

Rules and regulations of tenancy should be
established by the authority to provide reasonable control over tenant actions
which might infringe on rights of other tenants to peaceful possession of their
apartments or tend to impair residential character of project. Suggested rules
and regulations are available from the division, but they should be reviewed
and modified to meet local conditions. A copy of the rules and regulations
adopted by the authority is to be filed with the division. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1627-4.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
